DOC.brief_summary: This single ascend dose study assess safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics AZD4451 .
DOC.brief_title: Single Ascending Dose Study Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics AZD4451
DOC.criteria: Provide sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure perform . include genetic sampling analysis . If volunteer decline participate genetic component study , penalty loss benefit volunteer . The volunteer exclude aspect study describe protocol . Healthy male female ( nonchildbearing potential ) volunteer 18 55 year old inclusive suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture . Females must negative pregnancy test screen admission unit , must nurse must nonchildbearing potential , confirm screen fulfil one follow criterion : Postmenopausal define amenorrhoea least 12 month follow cessation exogenous hormonal treatment FSH level laboratory define postmenopausal range Documentation irreversible surgical sterilization hysterectomy , bilateral oophorectomy , bilateral salpingectomy tubal ligation Male volunteer willing use barrier contraception example , condom spermicide , day dose least 3 month dose investigational product . Have body mass index ( BMI ) 19 30 kg/m2 ( BMI < 30.5 =30 ) weigh least 50 kg 100 kg inclusive . History gastrointestinal surgery ( cholecystectomy appendectomy ) unintentional rapid weight loss . A positive result screen serum hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C antibody human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) . History follow judged Investigator : History psychiatric disorder define Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders text revision ; Medically diagnose depression 6 month prior dose ; Bipolar disorder ; Use psychoactive medication ( include mood stabilizer ) 6 month prior dose ; Electroconvulsive therapy 6 month prior dose ; History seizures 1 year prior dosing ; History severe dystonic reaction drug . History syncope , faint vasovagal reaction ; history arrhythmia , and/or postural hypotension . The inclusion volunteer meet criterion may decide casebycase basis consultation Investigator AZ CPA physician .
